name: autoattendance-backend-services
description: Este repositorio contiene los servicios backend para la aplicación AutoAttendance, implementados utilizando una arquitectura de microservicios con autenticación centralizada.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "agency,gateway,attendance,schedule,user" -c "blue,green,red,yellow,magenta" "cd agency-service && npm run dev" "cd api-gateway && npm run dev" "cd attendance-service && npm run dev" "cd schedule-service && npm run dev" "cd user-service && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd agency-service && npm install" "cd api-gateway && npm install" "cd attendance-service && npm install" "cd schedule-service && npm install" "cd user-service && npm install"
